metadata.Plot: The Locke family is devastated when they learn that their 2-year-old son Dax has leukemia.
metadata.Actors: Candace Cameron Bure, Jeanne Neilson, Christopher Shone
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. 1 nomination total
